about1: Because I find describing myself somewhat difficult I'll take the help of my friends. They say I am, Spirited, Fun loving, Blunt, Caring, Twisted(yea that too), Impulsive, Easy to talk to ( I hate that one ), Foodie, Pleasant and Talkative. I believe am a happy go lucky kind of a person. I take life as it comes and try and make the most out of it in my own way ! Rigidity bores me and I find it difficult to stick to a long term plan. I have varied interests. Some of them are listening to music ( there's no specific genre really, anything that gets me hooked on to it ) , watching movies ( Hindi and english only, nothing with subtitles and mostly happy movies ), love to keep myself updated with new gadgets ( always have a ' To Buy' list ready !. Other interests come and go. I am looking for a companion who can take me for all that I have mentioned above and will give me enough space to grow as a person ! Additionally, I'd like to put forth the expectations that I for sure can't ever meet/"conditions" that I can live by. This will help save the both of us time. So, here it goes. Having stayed in a metropolitan all my life I don't see myself settling down in a tier II city. Also, am not well versed with household chores, I can manage but I will have to learn, thus if your expectations are that of a "homely" girl then am not the one for you. Am assuming that the definition of homely is that of a girl who knows how to cook and will be excellent at household chores the day she steps in. I work to keep myself happy and for personal growth and my main goal in life is to lead it happily content. As a habit I don't accept interests with a way too tiny write-up and no picture. If you've read alllll of the above then kudos : ) Look forward to hear from you !

The fragrance of rain drenching the parched earth,
The flash of lightning against an blue sky,
The temple bells chiming on festival day... A bunch of flowers of various color,
Farm houses full of corps n green plants,
Light smell of soul,
N
cheerfulness of babies etc.
ItAA?A?s these small pleasures in life that make me happy. For me, festivals related to Lord Krishna are very important the is our family deity after all.
But I respect all religions and faiths.
When I am passing by a church, gurudwara or masjid,
my hands immediately fold into a Namaste as a mark of reverence.
For me all religions are the same and lead to almighty.
ItAA?A?s just that each one professes it in a different way.
My soul mate should respect my sentiments. For a relationship to be successful, it must be based on mutual understanding. Just as I donAA?A?t expect my partner to blindly follow my faith, he too should give me the space to follow mine.

about1: Every man on this earth lives a living but only few of them live LIFE. I am one of those people who really live their life. I donAA?A?t think a lot about things and enjoy life as it comes. I donAA?A?t waste even a single second in my life as I think every second is worth a lot of attention and gratitude. I feel life is an experiment, the more experiments one makes the better. I donAA?A?t say I have made many experiments but I support this thought. Life to me is an amazing experience as I am sure that I will not get another chance. As a person, I am very simple and honest. I have never cheated or bluffed any human being as I will not be worthy of my own respect if I do so. I feel that when one is not worthy of his own respect then how can he expect others to respect them. I have never done anything that has let me down. There are things I am not very proud of in myself. I am very innocent and donAA?A?t fight for everything I find wrong. I am a Graphic Designer and enjoy my work a lot. I am not working at the moment as I am searching for a good job. In future, I want to excel in the same field and wish to accomplish myself well. My favorite travel destination is hill stations and they fascinate me a lot. Apart from that, I like reading and listening to music. They not only entertain me but refresh my mind too.
about2: I am very career oriented and enjoy my work a lot. The man I get married to must keep that in my mind and should never ask me to leave my work. This will make me very uncomfortable. I know how to manage work along with household and he wonAA?A?t have to worry about that. I like to be friendly with people who are good me and if the family I get married into is good enough I am sure I will adjust well with them. I will not only respect them but also love them with my whole heart. As I mentioned I am very innocent I donAA?A?t want them to be very clever and take unnecessary advantage of me and my family. They should be as simple as my family and me. This way it will be easy for us to gel up and understand one another well. I am traditional as a person and respect our culture but if required I can adjust to modern ideas and way of living. My adjusting nature has helped me out in every field. The man I get married to must be a professional as this way he will be more responsible as far as our family is concerned. I want him to accept me the way I am, if he is not like that he will not get to see the real me. I am sure that if he is what I want I will make him very happy and all I will require from his side will be support and lots of love and care.
